name: A SWELL BULLET-HELL
description:
You’re a dog trapped within a never-ending bullet-hell! How long will you last? CONTROLS: W: Forward
S : Backward
A: Rotate Left
D: Rotate Right
E: Exit / Enter Armor
LEFT CLICK: Fire Left Cannon
RIGHT CLICK: Fire Right Canon
R: Restart Game

This game, in addition to being my submission for the 39th Ludum Dare, is also my first game ever! 

Feedback is very welcomed.
